item.title: Map: 6.2-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Near Turkey
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.

item.title: Killing of Civilians Near Pahalgam in Kashmir Shatters Illusion of Calm
item.description: India had claimed in recent years that its heavy-handed approach had brought peace to the long-restive region. The attack on Tuesday showed that wasn’...

item.title: Pope Francis’ Coffin Is Moved to St. Peter’s Basilica to Lie in State
item.description: Crowds flocked to pay their respects and bid farewell to the pontiff, who died on Monday at the age of 88.

item.title: Will Canada’s Next Prime Minister Solve the Million-Dollar Housing Crisis?
item.description: Soaring housing costs, with many homes nearing $1 million, have sparked an exodus from cities like Vancouver, and Canadians want their next prime mini...

item.title: The Faithful Pay Their Respects as Pope Francis’ Coffin Lies in State
item.description: The late Pope’s body was brought into St. Peter’s Basilica on Wednesday and will lie in state for three days before his funeral on Saturday.
